title: What We Do
description: We take your ideas and turn them into reality. Book Tailor guides you through every step of the process:

items.text: Answer a few simple questions about your book, and we’ll generate personalized ideas tailored to your vision.
Our advanced AI works with your input to craft a detailed and engaging manuscript that captures your unique voice and perspective.
From tone and genre to cover design, you have full control over how your book looks and feels.
We format your book for digital or print, ensuring it’s ready for platforms like Amazon Kindle or as a beautifully printed copy.
